continue_watching_settings.title: Continue Watching
continue_watching_settings.use_cached_desc: When enabled, clicking Continue Watching items will open the player directly using previously played streams. When disabled, opens a content screen instead.
continue_watching_settings.open_metadata_desc: When cached streams are disabled, open the Metadata screen instead of the Streams screen. This shows content details and allows manual stream selection.
continue_watching_settings.card_style_desc: Choose how Continue Watching items appear on the home screen
continue_watching_settings.cache_duration_desc: How long to keep cached stream links before they expire
continue_watching_settings.important_note_text: Not all stream links may remain active for the full cache duration. Longer cache times may result in expired links. If a cached link fails, the app will fall back to fetching fresh streams.
continue_watching_settings.how_it_works_cached:
• Streams are cached for your selected duration after playing
• Cached streams are validated before use
• If cache is invalid or expired, falls back to content screen
• "Use Cached Streams" controls direct player vs screen navigation
• "Open Metadata Screen" appears only when cached streams are disabled
continue_watching_settings.how_it_works_uncached:
• When cached streams are disabled, clicking Continue Watching items opens content screens
• "Open Metadata Screen" option controls which screen to open
• Metadata screen shows content details and allows manual stream selection
• Streams screen shows available streams for immediate playback
